page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: Most of the buses in this area run through{Chadwell}and on to the {hospital}at Orsett. Five run through Chadwell and three go through{Linford and{East Tilbury,}but only one to { {West Tilbury.} There is only one train route :-Southend to Fenchurch Street. It stops at East Tilbury, but although it goes through, it does not stop at West Tilbury.There is a level-crossing at both places but the West Tilbury station was closed about 18 years ago. The main method of getting around in the area is by car. There are no new roads,many winding country ones, and mainly residential ones.Certainly, for the residents of West Tilbury a car has become a necessity.
